sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>To Allow placing of a successor task freely anywhere in planning console by moving the task back and forth.</description> <name>AllowChangeOfDatesOnSuccessorTaskInTSP5</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[function allowDateChangeOnSuccessor(){ var value = gs.getProperty('tsp5.project.allow_start_on_relations'); if(value == 'false') gs.setProperty('tsp5.project.allow_start_on_relations',true); }
allowDateChangeOnSuccessor();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-06-08 07:42:19</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a4f1f3d8c7933200a56442808e976348</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>AllowChangeOfDatesOnSuccessorTaskInTSP5</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">3f3c811fdb22111086a072c7f4961972</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a4f1f3d8c7933200a56442808e976348</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-06-08 07:45:29</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
